sections.summary: A patient’s inquiry about MAID can take many forms:7 An explicit request for MAID;A general inquiry of all available options to reduce suffering and expedite death (including MAID);An express desire to end their life with the help of a medical or nurse practitioner. subsections.heading: Clinician develops care plan for the provision of MAID

sections.summary: The Clinician develops a care plan for the provision of MAID through discussions with the patient, individuals chosen by the patient and other care team members. sections.heading: Definition of terms
sections.summary: A physician who is licensed to practice medicine in Ontario. A registered nurse who is licensed to practice as a nurse practitioner in Ontario. For this resource, the term Clinician refers to the medical or nurse practitioner that is overseeing the provision of MAID for an individual patient.
